data.fullContent: The solution I came up with is shown below. Please note that I'm not 100 % sure if this is the `` best '' solution, but my personal understanding of the PAST compiler is limited. So, while this solution works, I may teach you the wrong `` habit ''. Please be aware of this.
data.answer: 我提出的解决方案如下所示。请注意，我不是100%确定这是否是最好的解决方案，但我个人对过去的编译器的理解是有限的。所以，虽然这个解决方案有效，但我可能会教你错误的“习惯”。请注意这一点。
